public Deadline(String description, String by) throws DukeException{
throw new DukeException("Please input the date and time in this format: dd/mm/yyyy hhmm");
return "[D]" + super.toString() + "(by: " + DeadlineFormatDateTime + ")";//super will use the Parent's/base class method instead of the child's/sub class method
DateTimeFormatter customFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("d'" + ordinalConversion(localDateTimeString) + "' 'of' MMMM yyyy, h':'mma");
public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException{
System.out.println("Hello! I'm Duke\nWhat can I do for you?");

tasks.add(new ToDo("todo " + description));// = new ToDo("todo " + description);
tasks.add(new Event("event " + description, by));// = new Event("event " + description, by);
Scanner scan = new Scanner(System.in); //taking in input
